RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/pgsql/readme.txt
RuleSet.GenRule:
You will find a number of script files in this directory, all of which are intended to be executed using psql to install a $DbSchemaName$ database.
Each of the *.ksh scripts accepts the following arguments unless otherwise noted:
-S server The name of the PostgreSQL server to use. -U username The admin login name for the server (postgres). -P password The admin password for logging in. -d database The name of the database to contain the schema. -L logfile Where to write the log messages.
$dbadminfilename_CreateDatabase$ will also create the tablespaces for the database if you specify:
-D datadir The directory for the tablespace.
If you don't specify a directory, it's assumed that the tablespaces $lower DbSchemaName$_data1 and $lower DbSchemaName$_idx1 already exists.

Database Creation Scripts -------------------------
crdatabase_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Creates the database $lower DbSchemaName$ in the $lower DbSchemaName$_data1 tablespace. Optionally creates the $lower DbSchemaName$_data1 and $lower DbSchemaName$_idx1 tablespaces if "-d dirName" is specified on the command line.
crdb_$lower DbSchemaName$.ksh The master script for creating the database schema.
cridg_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Creates the database id generator objects.
crtbl_$lower DbSchemaName$.ksh Creates the database tables.
cridx_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Creates the database table indexes.
crrel_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Creates the relationships between the tables.
$iterate SchemaTables( each dbadminnamelist_CreateTable empty empty )$ The individual table creation scripts called by crtbl_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql.
$iterate SchemaTables( each dbadminnamelist_SchemaTableIndexes empty empty )$ The individual table index creation scripts called by cridx_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql.

Database Drop Scripts ---------------------
drdb_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Drops the id generators, tables, indexes and constraints of the database.
dridg_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Drops the database id generator objects.
drtbl_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Drops the database tables.
dridx_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Drops the database table indexes.
drrel_$lower DbSchemaName$.pgsql Drops the relationships between the tables.
